guides.guideContent:
There are four options for you to choose the products you want:

1.）Search product by category, click the category you need.

2.）Enter the product you want in the search box then will show you some related products.

3.）Click “all products” option >> choose the min inventory, min/max price, ”shipping from”  & “shipping to” & “shipping time” and the supplier you like.

4.) You can click the blank option box of the item you want or click “select all” to choose all the product >> add them to your inventory list or download the product information file.

guides.guideTitle: How to add tags, manage tags, Inventory List page filter box function description?
guides.guideContent:
How to make products collection to manage products and then ASAP to know products update:

Step 1 Click products to product detail page >> Click "Add to Inventory List" button and add products to inventory

Step 2 A pop-up showed up to choose one of tag or add new tag to add products to the tag you choose >> Click "Confirm" button and add products to the tag choosed >> Go to Inventory List page and see the products add and a tag showed beside it

Step 3 Click "Tag Management" button to see the products collection file you added, you can click "Add New Tags" as well to add new products file

Step 4 Add s on products to make products collection first >> Click "Tag Management" button to tag management page >> Turn on the Monitor switch to track products update on the tag file basis >> Any update of the products in the tag file monitored will show in the "Update Info" page

Step 5 Click "Notification Settings" button to set notification rule >> Click "Add a New Notification Rule" button to set email notification rule.

Step 6 Fill in Rule Name & Choose tag file & Choose frequency >> Done & click "Confirm" button to complete email notification rule >> Any update of the products in the tag file you choosed that you will receive mail alert according to your email notificatioin rule.

guides.guideTitle: How to judge whether it is an Amazon banned product?
guides.guideContent: Doba products are authorized by the supplier and can be sold on various platforms, but some of them are not supported to be sold on Amazon, and you can find this information on the Product Details Page as below shown.
You can see the shipping information on the product page, such as shipping method, shipping cost, shipping time, etc.

• Add to inventory list

You can add the products you want to the inventory list as below shows. You can also add "Tag" for the products you want to add to the inventory list or just click "Skip"

  • List to store

You can list the products you like to your store directly in the product detail page >> modify the products information then upload to your store.

Note:We support you can use "list it to store" option only when you list the products to eBay/Shopify/Wix/Bigcommerce store.

  • Download

You can download the product csv file as below show.

  • Add to cart

You can add the product to your cart >> purchase the product from you cart directly.

1.) After you enter “Product Detail Page”, you can find the inventory, place of dispatch, processing time and other information.

2.) Click “choose shipping method” >> enter a ZIP CODE (the country you mainly want to ship to) >> then you can find the shipping method, shipping time and shipping cost.

3.) DOBA products are authorized by the supplier and can be sold on various platforms, but some of them are not supported to be sold on Amazon or the other platforms, and you can find this information on the Product Details Page as like the screenshot shows.

guides.guideTitle: Description of supplier store information, how to filter store categories.
guides.guideContent:
Enter the supplier’s page, you could find there are a lot of information.

Those information would be the good clue to help you to find a good and reliable supplier.

Available Item Count means “Item quantity”

Fulfillment means “Tthe average fulfillment percentage for the supplier in the past 3 month.”

Refund Rate means"The average Refund Rate percentage for the supplier in the past 3 month."

Shipping Origin means"Location of the warehouse for the supplier."

Average Handling Time means"The historical average of how long it has taken the supplier to accept/reject an order since it has been funded. This processing time does not include shipping and delivery to the buyer."

Stated Processing Time means" Based on estimates from the supplier of the time it takes from the moment an order is funded until it as been accepted/rejected by the supplier. This handling time does not include shipping and delivery to the buyer."

guides.guideTitle: How to search suppliers, how to mark suppliers?
guides.guideContent:
You can know about Available tem Count, Fulfillment, Refund Rate, Average Processing Time / Estimated Processing Time and store open date information in the “Find Supplier” page. And you can also sort these information then find the suppliers you like.

Click “Find Suppliers” option and you can find all the suppliers on daba >> enter the name of the supplier you want to find >> Click “View Products” then you can see all products of this supplier.

Mark the supplier as your favorite supplier then you can find the suppliers you like faster.
